title: I just got disconnected. Exit client and relog to get back into game. Game is over!?
body:
So, I got dcd. Exit game to re-enter game. Client froze. Exit League to log back in. Back in homepage and lobby, able to Reque for new game. OP.GG says I'm still in that game and that it's still going on.

I can't re-enter the game! Will I get a loss and afk reports and possible punished for this!?

replies.body: If this is your first leave you should be okay.  [Leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ)  would only impact you if you have more than one leave.  We don't have visibility on third party sites so we can't say for sure how accurate or in-sync it is.  I'd like to help resolve whatever is causing this freeze though.  Are you getting any error messages, or is there a specific moment this is happening?

I checked my match history, and it seems the game never registered. Either everyone were kicked out of the game, or I never get the loss for it but my teammates did. I played Morgana and the last game on my match history is Lux.

All that happened was I got an "attempting to reconnect" sign while playing. Waited a while, nothing happened. So decided to exit the game and reconnect, but the client froze, just a big "L" logo. I closed it through ctrl alt delete. Opened the client again, logged in, and was sent to the homepage and never got to reconnect to game.
